name: BOLT (Titi Monky, Kalangoya, FatFluffyBee, Vincent Decailly (CaZba))
name_original: BOLT (Titi Monky, Kalangoya, FatFluffyBee, Vincent Decailly (CaZba))
description:
BOLT is an hypercasual  mobile-game where the player take the control of a ball with insane bounciness !

Drag, release and destroy everything but dont forget to collect all the coins !

Unleash the lightning power for explore amazing levels.

Project made for school project in one week.

Credits :

  • Lucas Huriaux
  • Corentin Vignaud
  • Vincent Decailly
  • Théo Calvez

Controls :

  • Left click
  • Your finger

Made with Unity 2020 and FMOD
